subject: Automobile Racing
Accidents and Safety
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: An energy-absorbing foam product used in Nascar’s Car of Tomorrow is combustible, a fact that was not made clear to all teams that installed it.
snippet: An energy-absorbing foam product used in Nascar’s Car of Tomorrow is combustible, a fact that was not made clear to all teams that installed it.
